channel.title: Weird Coding On Devy
channel.description:
Ok Well I Am Coding An Devolution Source And I Want To Add A Case Where In Ardyrouge You Can Thieve From The Stalls As You Probley Know Devolution Is Hard To Add A Case So I Did Add It Right I Put
case:2026 <--- number of stall Additem(1647,1);
And If I Figure Out How To Add Like SomeTimes You Get Nothing Other Times You Get It Ill Add That So i Saved Compiled Thevied Got Nothing!
Please Help

item.title: Weird Coding On Devy
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

This might not work because i dont know if dodian has chances
but try it anyway

case 2026: if(actionTimer <= 0){ int chance = 0; chance = misc.random(5); if(chance <= 3){ sM("MESSAGE HERE"); addSkillXP(30, 17); setAnimation(0x340); actionTimer = 20; } else if(chance > 3){ sM("You failed to thieve anything"); actionTimer = 20;}} break;
I wouldnt know how to make that work in dodian if it doesnt
if it doesnt use it as a guide to making your own because i know what your asking for lol
the battle against bad grammar

Read full topic
